name: Gmail Modify Message Labels
description: Adds or removes labels from a Gmail message (e.g., mark as read/unread, starred).

inputs.name: endpoint
inputs.description: The Gmail API endpoint to call

inputs.name: messageId
inputs.description: The ID of the message to modify

inputs.name: addLabelIds
inputs.description: Labels to add to the message (comma-separated IDs)

inputs.name: removeLabelIds
inputs.description: Labels to remove from the message (comma-separated IDs)
